meanings.definition: Involving many different and confusing aspects or elements.
meanings.sent1: The math problem was so complicated that I couldn't solve it.
meanings.sent2: The instructions for building the model airplane were too complicated for me to follow.
meanings.sent3: Trying to untangle my headphones always turns into a complicated mess.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a complicated maze, full of twists and turns.
meanings.sent5: The complicated puzzle left me feeling frustrated and overwhelmed.

meanings.sent1: The scientific theory was too complicated for me to grasp.
meanings.sent2: The legal documents were so complicated that I needed help understanding them.
meanings.sent3: His explanation of quantum physics was so complicated, it sounded like gibberish to me.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were a complicated puzzle, hard to decipher.
meanings.sent5: The complicated plot of the movie left me scratching my head in confusion.

meanings.definition: Made up of many interrelated parts.
meanings.sent1: The complicated machine required a skilled technician to repair it.
meanings.sent2: The complicated network of roads in the city often caused traffic jams.
meanings.sent3: The complicated dance routine was a challenge to learn but rewarding to perform.
meanings.sent4: Their relationship was like a complicated web, with many connections and layers.
meanings.sent5: The complicated recipe called for a variety of ingredients and precise measurements.
